name: Little World Gifts
tag_list: virtual-goods, virtual-gifts, platform, lbs, 3d-gifts, social-gifting, mobile, iphone, application
overview:
Little World Gifts is now closed. ===================

Little World Gifts is a virtual gifts and virtual merchandising platform enabling brands to deliver superior quality marketing content on mobile devices and online. Virtual gifts are currently experiencing explosive growth online. Many online publishers and major brands are recognising the power of virtual gifts to generate revenues and to increase awareness or loyalty amongst their customers. Little World Gifts was created in 2009 to capitalise on this opportunity and delivers both a brand marketing platform on the web and consumer gift stores on mobile. It is a unique, game-changing service with enormous market potential. The company has partnerships already in place with global brands including WWF and Tate Museum.

Little World Giftsâ€™ first mobile app has received considerable press interest (Macworld, Techcrunch, Fast Company), great user feedback and has already been featured by Appleâ€™s iTunes App Store globally. The service was recently named as one of the top 50 most innovative mobile companies by Mobile Entertainment.

Little World Gifts is owned by Kisky Netmedia a social mobile company based in Liverpool, UK. It is lead by Paul Stringer and Katie Lips who formerly founded Treasuremytext.com a popular SMS archive service. Little World Gifts is currently in the process of securing a second round of private funding.
